bioconda.name: beagle
bioconda.summary: Beagle is a software package for phasing genotypes and for imputing ungenotyped markers.

biocontainers.name: beagle
biocontainers.summary: Beagle is a software package that performs genotype calling, genotype phasing, imputation of ungenotyped markers, and identity-by-descent segment detection.

biotools.summary: Beagle is a software package that performs genotype calling, genotype phasing, imputation of ungenotyped markers, and identity-by-descent segment detection.

bioschemas.name: BEAGLE
bioschemas.summary: Beagle is a software package that performs genotype calling, genotype phasing, imputation of ungenotyped markers, and identity-by-descent segment detection.
